name: Dark world (vocare4)
description:
This is my 3D FPS, class project from Game Design and Development on Coursera.org. 

It's taken me some time to add my changes as work has been having me travel almost every other week. 

Modifications:

  1. There are 3 levels with a final boss fight.
  2. Changed music in all 3 levels. 
  3. Killing enemy drops door key.
  4. Changed the sky box background in each level.
  5. Did you bring your flash light? 

Credits

Created by Ryan Petry

Assets supplied by: 
Brian Winn, Michigan State University
Skybox Volume 2, Hedgehog Team
Music from Fanatical
